mapper.select: SELECT a.deviceid, d.machineroomaddress, e.boardid FROM deviceinfo a INNER JOIN project2device b ON a.deviceid = b.deviceid and b.projectid = #{projectid} INNER JOIN cabinetinfo c ON a.cabinetid = c.cabinetid INNER JOIN machineroominfo d ON c.machineroomid = d.machineroomid LEFT JOIN boardinfo e ON a.deviceid = e.deviceid ORDER BY a.deviceid, d.machineroomaddress, e.boardid

SELECT a.deviceid, c.machineroomaddress, count( d.boardid ) AS boardcnt FROM deviceinfo a INNER JOIN cabinetinfo b ON a.cabinetid = b.cabinetid INNER JOIN machineroominfo c ON b.machineroomid = c.machineroomid LEFT JOIN boardinfo d ON a.deviceid = d.deviceid WHERE a.companyid = #{companyid} AND a.deviceid NOT IN ( SELECT deviceid FROM project2device ) GROUP BY a.deviceid, c.machineroomaddress
SELECT a.id, b.cabinetid, b.machineroomname, a.deviceid, a.companyid, c.devicestatus FROM deviceinfo a INNER JOIN machineroominfo b ON a.cabinetid = b.id LEFT JOIN devicestatus c ON c.deviceid = a.id
